Title: Designates a portion of the state highway system as the Trooper James M. MacLarnon Memorial Bridge
Summary: Designates a portion of the state highway system in Nassau county as the "Trooper James M. MacLarnon Memorial Bridge".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the highway law, in relation to designating a portion of the state highway system as the "Trooper James M. MacLarnon Memorial Bridge"
